014package org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper;
015
016import java.util.Locale;
017import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
018
019import org.jdbi.v3.meta.Beta;
020
021/**
022 * Strategies for comparing case sensitive strings.
023 */
024@Beta
025public enum CaseStrategy implements UnaryOperator<String> {
026    /**
027     * No case sensitivity.
028     */
029    NOP {
030        @Override
031        public String apply(String t) {
032            return t;
033        }
034    },
035    /**
036     * All strings to lowercase in root locale.
037     */
038    LOWER {
039        @Override
040        public String apply(String t) {
041            return t.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT);
042        }
043    },
044    /**
045     * All strings to uppercase in root locale.
046     */
047    UPPER {
048        @Override
049        public String apply(String t) {
050            return t.toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT);
051        }
052    },
053    /**
054     * All strings to lowercase in system locale.
055     */
056    LOCALE_LOWER {
057        @Override
058        public String apply(String t) {
059            return t.toLowerCase();
060        }
061    },
062    /**
063     * All strings to uppercase in system locale.
064     */
065    LOCALE_UPPER {
066        @Override
067        public String apply(String t) {
068            return t.toUpperCase();
069        }
070    },
071}
